cause.description:
As many as 50 vehicles are trapped in the rubble or in the river after the eight-lane interstate bridge collapsed during Minneapolis' evening rush hour Wednesday. Twenty to 30 people were missing. The tragedy August 1st should always be a day of remembrance. People all over the world will learn from this preventable accident and they will all have a place in our hearts. GOD BLESS THE PEOPLE AND THE FAMILIES THAT LOST SOMEONE ON THIS AWFULL DAY. GOD BLESS
1. Never again sould this happen
2. not natural, not human, but government neglegence
3. we need to help these families cope
cause.mission: Create Awareness about this devastating disaster and help the families who lost loved ones come to peace of mind
cause.name: Minneapolis Bridge Tragedy
